text: It snowed at Mt Mitchell last night so I think we picked the best weekend to go camping :snowflake::snowflake::snowflake:
I lost my passport, gold ornaments, watches etc. after my camping trip :( I realized yesterday when I was cleaning the stuff :see_no_evil:
oh no! what are you going to do about your passport?
Filed a police complaint this morning. I have to do some paper work with the US Embassy, India Embassy, Institute and apply for a new one.
I am sorry to hear that
<@U1KRNH021>: that's terrible! Did you check with the rental car company and in the tent y'all had?
<@U1KRNH021> sorry to hear that! why did you end up taking your passport with you? :cry:
I did not carry it to the camping. I kept in my closet.
It is insane that it is missing from my place. Uff !!! I am not really worried about the other stuff but getting the passport thing done is super painful :disappointed:
